0: In my younger and more vulnerable years.
1: Sometimes she and Miss Baker talked at once, unobtrusively and with a bantering inconsequence that was never quite chatter, that was as cool as their white dresses and their impersonal eyes in the absence of all desire.
3: In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since, Whenever you feel like criticizing any one, he told me, just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
